metadata.title: CVE-2024-41989 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Memory exhaustion in django.utils.numberformat.floatformat()

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-41989` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm6
python-django-common - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm6
python3-django - 1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm6
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: python-django package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.11.11-1ubuntu1.21+esm6').
